com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver

Class Solution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver.Solution

  • public class Solution
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a solution for a given equation or expression by holding a Step ArrayList.
    Author:
    Nateowami
